scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm test # && npm run gts-check
scripts.bundle: rollup src/index.ts --sourcemap --plugin typescript --plugin node-resolve --plugin commonjs --file dist/index.mjs --format esm
scripts.watch: rollup src/index.ts --watch --sourcemap --plugin typescript --plugin node-resolve --plugin commonjs --file dist/index.mjs --format esm
scripts.setup-husky: npm rebuild husky # much faster than the npm install --save-dev husky documented alternative
